```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## wide to long
```{r}
pulse_data = haven::read_sas("./public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
pulse_data
pivot_longer(
  pulse_data,
  bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
  names_to = "visit",
  names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
  values_to = "bdi"
)%>%
  mutate(
    visit = recode(visit,"bl" = "00m") ## use 00m to replace bl
  )


```


```{r}
litters_data = 
  read_csv("./FAS_litters.csv", col_types = "ccddiiii") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  separate(group, into = c("dose", "day_of_tx"), sep = 3) %>%
  mutate(
    dose = str_to_lower(dose),
    wt_gain = gd18_weight - gd0_weight) %>%
  arrange(litter_number)

```


```{r}
analysis_result = tibble(
  group = c("treatment", "treatment", "placebo", "placebo"),
  time = c("pre", "post", "pre", "post"),
  mean = c(4, 8, 3.5, 4)
)


pivot_wider(
  analysis_result,
  names_from = time,
  values_from = mean
)


```


```{r}
fellowship_ring = 
  readxl::read_excel("./LotR_Words.xlsx", range = "B3:D6") %>%
  mutate(movie = "fellowship_ring")

two_towers = 
  readxl::read_excel("./LotR_Words.xlsx", range = "F3:H6") %>%
  mutate(movie = "two_towers")

return_king = 
  readxl::read_excel("./LotR_Words.xlsx", range = "J3:L6") %>%
  mutate(movie = "return_king")

bind_rows(fellowship_ring,two_towersï¼Œreturn_king) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    female:male,
    names_to = "sex",
    values_to = "words"
    
  ) %>% 
  mutate(race = str_to_lower(race)) %>% 
  select(movie, everything()) 

```

## join the data

```{r}
pup_data = 
  read_csv("./FAS_pups.csv", col_types = "ciiiii") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(sex = recode(sex, `1` = "male", `2` = "female"))
pup_data

litter_data = 
  read_csv("./FAS_litters.csv", col_types = "ccddiiii") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-pups_survive) %>%
  mutate(
    wt_gain = gd18_weight - gd0_weight,
    group = str_to_lower(group))
litter_data

fas_data = 
  left_join(pup_data, litter_data, by = "litter_number") 
fas_data

```
